mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_item_id AS cartItemId, i.item_name AS itemNm, i.price, LEAST(ci.count, i.stock_number) AS count, ii.img_url AS imgUrl, i.stock_number AS stockNumber, i.item_id AS itemId FROM cart_item ci JOIN item i ON ci.item_id = i.item_id left join item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id AND ii.rep_img_yn = 'Y' WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId} order by ci.created_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into cart_item(cart_id, item_id, count, created_at) values (#{cartId}, #{itemId}, #{count}, NOW())
